memberdef.name: LWM2MObjectConnectivityMonitoringResources
memberdef.initializer: = { { 0, LWM2M_INTEGER(21) | LWM2M_READ_ONLY }, { 1, LWM2M_DYNAMIC_ARRAY(LWM2MGetAvailableNetworkBearer) | LWM2M_READ_ONLY }, { 2, LWM2M_INTEGER(0) | LWM2M_READ_ONLY }, { 4, LWM2M_DYNAMIC_ARRAY(LWM2MGetIpAddresses) | LWM2M_READ_ONLY }, }

briefdescription.para: This function is used to return the available network Bearer array.
This function is used to update the return the current IP address.
Enable LWM2M object instance. Start reporting values.
Initialize LWM2M object instance. Must be called before any other function call.
This file provides implementation for LWM2MObjectConnectivityMonitoring module.
